channel.title: Honey Berry on gardenR
channel.description: Recent content in Honey Berry on gardenR

item.title: Spring is here!
item.description: Googe Analytics I’ve been working on trying to integrate Google Analytics into this blog, so I can see how many people are actually reading it. Easy, right? HA! It should have worked fine, but as with everything, I had a bit of a nightmare. So the workflow is basically: set up a GA account, paste in the tracking code into your blogdown config.toml file (if your theme has this feature built in - and the one I’m using does) and it should work.

item.title: Pesky pests
item.description: Hello from sunny Leeds! Yes, more sunshine has been sent. Today has been really warm and the bank holiday weather was good for the plants. Note: I compress the images for the web, but I’ve noticed the quality is pretty naff and they go all blurred. Will look into improving these in the future. To begin, I will start with the ongoing experiment. The conclusion is: chilli seeds do not like to germinate!
